errors.error_description: Uses incorrect command syntax for virtual environment creation
correction_candidates: To get started, run `pip install pretalx` and then create your virtual environment with `python -m venv pretalx-env`.
To get started, run `pip install pretalx` and then create your virtual environment with `virtualenv venv`.
To get started, run `pip install pretalx` and then create your virtual environment with `conda create -n pretalx`.
To get started, run `pip install pretalx` and then create your virtual environment with `pipenv install`.
errors.golden_answer: To get started, run `pip install pretalx` and then create your virtual environment with `virtualenv venv`.
